text: It's good, IMO.  But very different gameplay from Secret of Mana.  Also very non-linear plot.  It's the type of game you either love or you hate.
author: Ender Rydel

text: Not in my books, but it's stil good times. The gameplay gets tiring after a while, and it's pretty damn easy. But it's got incredbile visuals, good sound, and some funny characters in it to keep you going!
author: Goldsac

text:
*raises a bottle of rum* Arr, Cheers to ye Yoko Shimomura! Amazing music to go with a masterpiece of a game.

And now to go to the beach and blare this tune on the beat box =)
author: FirePSG

text:
This is my favorite track from the game.  So adventurous and a nice fantasy vibe.  I love the percussion!  Just great energy all around.  

I remember playing this piece of  music constantly as my friend and I were making our way towards the beaches of Key West on a road trip.  I just played it over and over in the car.   I mean, it just kind of made sense at the time.   He was starting to get a little annoyed of it by the end of the trip.  But it's a good track !
